replies.body: *This thread has been archived. Commenting and voting have been disabled.*
Hi, I'm interested to know why is every thread getting archived, despite not being updated by others?
You guys are playing squishy AP casters against a champ that has a silence and tankyness. That's pretty much exactly what you would expect in most cases
Why is everyone, like... hating on this video? I thought it was funny. Getting Garen ult'd that many times in a game would make me hate Garen for a while too. lol

All I see are a bunch of Bards running out by themselves, with no proper vision, sometimes with little to no health. No armor. 

Every death is deserved. Not a bug. Functioning as intended.
Where does it say there's a bug? o.o
Problem is that there arent a lot of ranged junglers
To be fair...you were playing bard...I would hardly call that proof that Garen is truly hate worthy
He is still broken and with no nerfs in sight. Ok, Roit you disable teemo for a dumb reason but you left champs like garen in it who are op and broken in this game mode.

the answer to all of these "broken" mele champs (Darius, Garen, modrekaiser, yorick, etc.) is the same....pick something with range.  Velkoz, Ziggs, Xerath, etc.  if Garen can't get to you, he can't dunk you.
